channel.title: Adding a newcomer map and making it open a welcome or information screen

item.title: Adding a newcomer map and making it open a welcome or information screen
item.dc:creator: @JGX JGX
item.description:
@JGX wrote:

Okay well so far in my search I’ve got this:

if (wearID == 550) { showInterface(1834); interfaceOpened = true; return false; }

If that is the right code, do I just put it wherever in my client?
If that isn’t right someone please help me make this work.
I would like to make a newcomer come in the starter for new players and when they click on it, it opens up a window (like a ::command window) and displays information about the server.

Rep++ for help.

Thanks!

Read full topic
item.source: Adding a newcomer map and making it open a welcome or information screen
